mapper.select: select id, name, mentor, startTime, content, expectedCompetition, needMajor,tno from project
select name, mentor, startTime, content,expectedCompetition, needMajor, id,tno from project where name=#{title}
select id, name, mentor, startTime, content, expectedCompetition, needMajor,tno from project order by startTime desc limit 0,4
mapper.insert: insert into project(name, mentor, startTime, content, needMajor, id, expectedCompetition, tno) values (#{name},#{mentor},#{startTime},#{content},#{needMajor},#{id},#{expectedCompetition},#{tno});
